subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Brian Rolston, Marian Gaborik and Mikko Koivu scored less than two minutes apart in the second period, and the host Minnesota Wild beat the Anaheim Ducks, 5-1, on Wednesday night in the first game for both teams after the All-Star break.
snippet: Brian Rolston, Marian Gaborik and Mikko Koivu scored less than two minutes apart in the second period, and the host Minnesota Wild beat the Anaheim Ducks, 5-1, on Wednesday night in the first game for both teams after the All-Star break.
